text: Kapasia also spelled Kapasiya is a clan of the Gurjars of India and Pakistan. They can be found in the Punjab, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Azad Kashmir and Balochistan regions of Pakistan. Also found in Indian regions of Rajasthan, Uttar Pradesh, Haryana, Punjab, Jammu and Kashmir, and Dehli. ==References== Category:Gurjar clans Category:Gurjar clans of India Category:Gurjar clans of Pakistan
title: Kapasia
